about_the_game:
The High Concept


Mr. Arthur White is dead. Who killed him? How? What was the motive?

Who Killed Mr. White? is a narrative-heavy puzzle game where you’ll have to put your deduction skills at work, inspect 12 potential crime scenes, and figure out who among a cast of 7 characters is a murderer.

The Story


You’re a police detective. Someone at a brithday party calls 911 and reports a murder.
You arrive at the place, but apparently no crime was committed, and none of the guests admit to be the caller.

Your instincts, however, tell you something's wrong. One of the guests is mysteriously missing: Mr. White.
Then, as you keep searching the house, you finally stumble upon his body.

The Suspects

  • Teal Morris, ex-athlete, husband of the victim
  • Patrick Mauve, art gallerist, half-brother of the victim
  • Sienna Roy, architect, sister in law of the victim
  • Indigo Roy, journalist, twin sister of Sienna Roy
  • Adriana Lemon, manager, business associate of Patrick Mauve
  • David Peach, painter, unrelated acquaintance

name: Who Killed Mr. White?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A turn-based Clue-inspired detective game where you get to solve a murder mystery by interrogating paintings.
